text: Condemning the relocation of the office for the newly formed Komarapalayam Taluk, political parties, general public, and traders would stage a protest on February 15. The State Government recently announced the formation of a new taluk in Komarapalayam. Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy has recommended setting up of the taluk office in Avathipalayam which is about 3 km from Pallipalayam. The joint action committee met for the second time on Thursday at Pallipalayam. A general strike would be held on February 17 at Pallipalayam.Commercial establishments, power looms and textile processing units would participate.
title: TAMIL NADU
